revised_title: Tensor Theory and Group Characters in Invariant Theory
tldr: This article explores the relationship between tensor calculus and invariant theory, demonstrating their mathematical equivalence in elementary applications. It develops a technique for constructing concomitants using tensors and group theory, providing a foundation for understanding geometric configurations and their properties. The author also applies this theory to classical problems in invariant theory, such as generating functions and sets of concomitants.
